body:
As a user of Spack I want `environment-modules` v4.X to be supported as a module command so that I can use Spack shell integration with the latest version available.

### Rationale

Users that want to use Spack's shell integration should be able to employ the latest major version of `environment-modules`.

### Description

There's a PR that is mostly done to permit this integration, see #7536.
title: Permit Spack shell integration with Modules v4
